MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL32 postcode area of Conway, affecting properties in Maes Y Llan, Hendre Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:56AM. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency responce teams have arrived on site to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1PM.When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13PM on 26th December 2020.
